page.title: 17CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: For the young people there is a Cub pack, a Brownie pack and a Youth Club. For the women of the village there is the Women's Institute, the Parish Wives, the Conygar Club abd the Mother's Union. Also in the village there is the Royal British Legion Small Bore Rifle Club, various Badminton Clubs, Old Time Dancing, snooker and billiards, an Over 60's Club, the Dunster Preservation Society, Mothers and Toddlers group, Conservative Association, darts and skittles teams affiliated to various pubs and a Village Garden Society who see to the running of the Village Garden on the site of the old castle gardens, the Horticultural Society, football team and a cricket team.
